Restaurant_Name: Cora Déjeuners et Diners (1396 avenue du Mont Royal)
Address: 1396 Avenue Du Mont Royal, Montreal, QC H2J
Review:
its been a while since i enjoyed being in cora branches but this branch made my decision for the future a bit foggy 
3 ladies were serving us there anne annick and chantal in comparison with ontario branches it was small and we could not find maple syrup on the table in ontario there is jam and butter and ketchup
in this branch it was not

usually in ontario you get coffee top up and here they didnt offer us

something that made me nervous was the milk they figure it out annich told us but the decision is hard to take reputation of your brand or 6 sick customer that the milk was not good and offered us 3 new cappuccino but i told them be careful we are traveling and its not good to be sick with dieriha in a road trip

even with the situation we didnt get sick and the food was good

if i were the manager of that branch i give annick a raise because i didnt enjoy the atmosphere of cora and the food this time i cant forget annick decision that saved us from being sick on our trip

Restaurant_Name: Cora Déjeuners et Diners (1396 avenue du Mont Royal)
Address: 1396 Avenue Du Mont Royal, Montreal, QC H2J
Review: great classic brunch spot thats also kid and stroller friendly great and friendly service and super accommodating when we had to switch tables because we needed more space for a stroller and toddler

Restaurant_Name: Cora Déjeuners et Diners (1396 avenue du Mont Royal)
Address: 1396 Avenue Du Mont Royal, Montreal, QC H2J
Review: good service clean restraunt food is not to die for but cooked right its corporate cora not the cook or this establisments fault

Restaurant_Name: Cora Déjeuners et Diners (1396 avenue du Mont Royal)
Address: 1396 Avenue Du Mont Royal, Montreal, QC H2J
Review: the waiter had problems with english and gave me another thing i didnt order after asking her to change it again my order was wrong but my partner was waiting for me and i didnt cause problems because they could not understand me

Address: 5679 Avenue Du Parc, Montréal, QC H2V
Review: nice computerized system you put your order and you get at123 fresh special made bagels amazing drinks cappuccino mochachino and more

Address: 5679 Avenue Du Parc, Montréal, QC H2V
Review: lox sandwich was just like a new york deli and the cheese blintzes were delicious as well the orange juice is freshsqueezed and the other drinks are great as well

Address: 5679 Avenue Du Parc, Montréal, QC H2V
Review: very friendly staff easy to order with their ordering machine at the front

Address: 5679 Avenue Du Parc, Montréal, QC H2V
Review: best place for breakfast and lunch delicious food a bit expensive but manageable highly recommend

Address: 5679 Avenue Du Parc, Montréal, QC H2V
Review: nice spot

Address: 3429 Rue Peel, Montreal, QC H3A 1W7
Review: salad is too salty but salmon sandwich is sooo good also onecard accepted

Address: 3429 Rue Peel, Montreal, QC H3A 1W7
Review: i would prefer a lunch of assembled available kosher items from a supermarket to the one i had here though i stress that my review is based on my familys single experience our experience in this restaurant was disappointing some of the very limited menu items were unavailable sandwiches took unreasonably long to prepare in the nearempty restaurant and the prices seemed rather high for the portion sizes and food quality the fries appeared several minutes before the sandwiches and they were greasy limp and undersalted nothing in our order tasted great but everything was okay i doubt i will return to this restaurant on subsequent visits to montréal

Address: 3429 Rue Peel, Montreal, QC H3A 1W7
Review: its a very small place with about 10 tables the food is very simple salad paninis sandwiches and some simple desserts its a nice place to just come and eat quickly or grab a bite on your way somewhere its very clean and neat and cozy

Address: 3429 Rue Peel, Montreal, QC H3A 1W7
Review: a great place for kosher keeping people staying in downtown i went there twice and ordered once to my hotel using uber eats which is a very convenient option

Address: 3429 Rue Peel, Montreal, QC H3A 1W7
Review:
one of the scarce kosher places open during pessah  good and fresh nice and warm hosts
thanks habad like always a safe place and welcoming to be everywhere in the world

Address: 2876 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y 1W9
Review: a long line up when we arrived yet we were greeted by friendly staff english menu was available you just have to ask for it good portion of the dishes and the sausage are really good highly recommended

Address: 2876 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y 1W9
Review: delicious breakfast with a variety to please everyone and great service

Address: 2876 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y 1W9
Review:
very disappointed as we come here often called this morning to get take out for my very sick mother
picked it up as get home to find they forgot part of our order it happens so we called to get a refund for the missing items and were told we would have to drive back find parking on masson and come i to get the money back i have a sick mother and a cranky toddler  i should not have to drive back to fix their mistake

Address: 2876 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y 1W9
Review: the best breakfast in town i love ordering from here the food is fresh on time and always delicious this is my third time ordering and i havent been disappointed once fast friendly service and always accurate great choice all around

Address: 2876 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y 1W9
Review: waitress was so lovely and the food was good it was a nice place to go with friends

Address: 2734 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y
Review: went on a holiday and was severely disappointed with the service we were originally told to sit wherever but i guess we chose a spot that was a little out of the waiting staffs eye as getting service was incredibly difficult food is okay classic breakfast options but i think the biggest issue is the restaurant is understaffed

Address: 2734 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y
Review: an old restaurant with lovely atmosphere the eggs are so funny and the service is so warm its a family own restaurant so i guess the waitress is the hostess she is really friendly and the host may be the chef who is also very friendly and we have some interesting talk the food is above the bar and the price is reasonable the setting of the food is one of the highlights

Address: 2734 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y
Review: group of two when we arrived we had been seated very quickly the menu was all in french but thats okay as im from montreal i was taken a back a little when i noticed that food portions are small which i wasnt impressed by the food quality was alright prices didnt make sense for what was being served considering other breakfast places serve more for the same price

Address: 2734 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y
Review:
this is a terrific breakfast spot for families the portions are generous with a lot of selection and the execution is solid my boys loved their crepes with bananas and chocolate while my wife and i enjoyed an omelette and eggs benedict
the servers are super sweet with the kids youll need to pack your french with you but like most places as long as youre trying youll get there
did not try the fruit smoothies though saw so many of them served i think we will have to come back and have them next time

Address: 2734 Rue Masson, Montréal, QC H1Y
Review: a solid neighborhood brunch place nothing hipster or really elevated but the menu has a lot of options and combinations including american style pancakes which drew me to try it the bacon was crispy the smoked meat was nice and hot and the service was friendly

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève
Address: 2355 Rue Beaubien E, Montréal, QC H2G
Review: it was the best bakery in montreal the bakery has various kinds of bread cheese jam goodies and snacks etc the employees are so kind and we enjoyed this experience a lot also it is a perfect place for outdoor brunch

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève
Address: 2355 Rue Beaubien E, Montréal, QC H2G
Review: this place has the best pastries ever specially the caneleé every time im in montréal this is always my first stop must go and try their delicious coffee as well

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève
Address: 2355 Rue Beaubien E, Montréal, QC H2G
Review: i would like to start by saying that ive been coming here to buy bread for at least 10 months and i have been coming here very often to get coffee for the past 3 months the bread and desserts here are amazing and most of the staff is nice there are 2 ladies that 90 of the time have had a really bad attitude and almost have been rude to me but i have one constant problem i keep ordering  decaf coffees and today is the 5th time in 3 months they gave me a caffeinated coffee  i have an anxiety disorder and im extremely sensitive to caffeine and alcohol i would really appreciate it if the people that work there would actually care to follow the specifications we want in our orders

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève
Address: 2355 Rue Beaubien E, Montréal, QC H2G
Review: edit to respond the price on ubereats is 795 per bûchette check that you set this price on ubereats didnt you i guess its fair enough for me to say its eight dollar i like the packaging which was really cute i bought one croissant and the coffret dégustation de bûche i enjoyed the croissant a lot probably one of the best croissant in montreal it was very crispy on the outside and tender but slightly chewy inside i didnt even need to heat it up on the other hand the cakes were average and a bit pricey  around 8 dollar for a small piece the taste was not bad i just thought the colorant in the macaron not necessary the icing on the raspberry one was not evenly spread but overall i would come again for their croissant

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève
Address: 2355 Rue Beaubien E, Montréal, QC H2G
Review:
really tasty and freshly baked bread
the little terrace outside is perfect for brunch
recommend it if you want to experience the french style of bakery and sandwiches

Address: 2550 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2A
Review: came back after many many years was looking forward to a fancy ice cream menu as i remembered it bananasplit brownietower type choices but disappointed that this is no longer an option my bad for not inquiring beforehand they do however have many interesting flavours to choose from in a cone or cup i discovered a new flavour marscapone almond fig which was actually quite delicious yum  i found pricing to be above theaverage  and the ice cream to be softer than im used to the staff was very friendly helpful and courteous  thank you  we sat at the tablecounter by the window so we could people watch during our conversation but this table is extremely wobbly and a couple of times when others sat at the other end of the same table last one pictured here it shook so much that it spilled my cappucino twice surely this is an easy fix

Address: 2550 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2A
Review: well trained employees with lots of knowledge of their products and extremely respectful to their customers ill like to thanks zach for showing me the wide variety of ice creams available will come back again thank you zach

Address: 2550 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2A
Review: just got a one liter i chose three flavors they filled up 34 of it with one flavor then all of it is almost liquid liquid plus the supposedly 1 liter weighs 880 grams including the container this was once a great place not any longer

Address: 2550 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2A
Review: thanks to my beautiful friend mary lee for sharing this place  amazing service

Address: 2550 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2A
Review: worst possible service we came from far on this beautiful sunday because i came once a few years back and i really loved it but this time will be the last one they were missing a lot of flavors pistachio baci lemon and more service was so bad they have a menu online with different mixes of gelato and fruits and all i came to ask for a menu or what are the choices and the girl was looking at me like a deer in the headlights she had no idea what i was talking about i said well on your website it says you have that and if you dont to at least update it she turned her back and didnt answer i was like ok then ill just get a gelato i went to sit and told my partner what a bad service it was and the table next to us overheard and told us they agreed too i understand the lack of labour but to this point of hiring whatever people come thats just bad

Address: 5511 Rue De Verdun, Montréal, QC H4H
Review:
amazing brunch and comfort food in here very friendly and attentive staff and cozy environment
the poutine breakfast is all you can ask in a meal you have the hearty potato the meltedsometimescrispy cheese with the meats and a perfectly poached egg on the top definitely a must try dish

Address: 5511 Rue De Verdun, Montréal, QC H4H
Review:
july 18 2023 adding 2nd review since i ordered again by ubereat and i have some pics still awesome nice and warm not too salty generous quantity and delicious sauce and amazing potatoes this place rocks

1st review i just ordered benedictine dish by delivery sorry i ate everything no picture and everything was fresh and delicious the potates and hollandaise sauce were amazing i can imagine how good breakfast poutine must be im glad that i have found another nice brunch spot next time i will be dining in the restaurant

Address: 5511 Rue De Verdun, Montréal, QC H4H
Review: our weekly spot for brunch the team is just amazing its a traditional brunch place  big portions good quality and affordable price

Address: 5511 Rue De Verdun, Montréal, QC H4H
Review: very popular place so you may have to wait to get seated during the weekend crowd but the service is fast and friendly generous portions breakfast in all its varieties are offered here with coffee refills just when your thinking another cup would be nice tips are appreciated at the cash

Address: 5511 Rue De Verdun, Montréal, QC H4H
Review: absolutely love this restaurant my husband and i come here all the time the staff are always friendly and serve the best breakfasts around

Address: 5214 Chemin De La Côte-Des-Neiges, Montréal, QC H3T 1X8
Review: very bad experience with this restaurant uber eats ordered grilled cheese and chocolatine aux amandes but the quality is very bad and even you can do better at home they are just taking walmart quality bread cheese and bacon and warming it no special restaurant ingredients quality feels superrrr cheap and not tasty at all no service issue just the food was testing bad

Address: 5214 Chemin De La Côte-Des-Neiges, Montréal, QC H3T 1X8
Review:
i tried the caramel macchiato 1010 and hot chocolate 610 6 bc even tho was just an average hot chocolate tasted like cacao and that was was like ok not that bad actually i drank it

the chocolatine was really good 1010
the ricotta cake was really good too 1010

Address: 5214 Chemin De La Côte-Des-Neiges, Montréal, QC H3T 1X8
Review: nice place good café food and coffee they rarely clean tables they may clear them and clients are expected to clear their own but even if they are doing the clearing the do not clean them also free refill on coffee but they never ever tell anybody that

Address: 5214 Chemin De La Côte-Des-Neiges, Montréal, QC H3T 1X8
Review:
coffee and bread were both perfect
i had a great experience with my friends here and would definitely visit again

Address: 5214 Chemin De La Côte-Des-Neiges, Montréal, QC H3T 1X8
Review: thank you au pain for offering free hot beverage  for the birthday  i always order the portugous natas  here and moca  was so good

Address: 2499 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2E 1W3
Review: the banh mi was delicious here  i cant get over how fresh the bread wasit was so good the menu had a great variety they had the classic cold cuts to vegetarian options dont let the outside construction deter you its worth it to visit for the food got to the meet the owner as well and she was lovely to chat to

Address: 2499 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2E 1W3
Review: this is the best bánh mì ive ever eaten the sauce is absolutely delicious will definitely order again

Address: 2499 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2E 1W3
Review: the banh mi here is amazing not only are they generous with the toppings the baguette is exactly how i like it crisp airy and dense enough to soak the mayo and pate ordered for my entire family and they loved it as much they also have variety of fresh fruit smoothie and imported cafe from vietnam for coffee enthusiasts amazing service and amazing food will definitely be coming back again

Address: 2499 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2E 1W3
Review: banh mi hanoi and it is an absolute neighborhood gem my personal favorite is their vegetarian banh mi  the tofu is flavorful and perfectly cooked vegetables are fresh and the bread is perfectly toasted i highly recommend stopping by the shop if you get the chance

Address: 2499 Jean Talon St E, Montreal, QC H2E 1W3
Review: the cutest place a little hidden by the construction but dont let that deter you from taking the detour to get there the quality of the ingredients was exceptional the bread was so fresh and the fillings were delicious get 5 the owner was so fun and bubbly 1010 would come back

Address: 1215 Avenue Du Mont-Royal E, Montreal, QC H2J 1Y2
Review:
ordered on ubereats and the small box was not even half full only the bottom on the box was covered with food it was about 23 empty

so disappointing especially considering the price on top of that the broccoli was undercooked not eating here again ive been to other cooper branch locations and received more much food this one clearly is reducing portion sizes as much as they can really disappointed with my experience

Address: 1215 Avenue Du Mont-Royal E, Montreal, QC H2J 1Y2
Review:
honestly good but not crazy i think it could be easily improve with maybe more spices  it would be nice to have the brocolis cut in smaller pieces too so we can enjoy all the flavors together also paying 17 dollars for a bowl and still being hungry is frustrating 
staff was kind

Address: 1215 Avenue Du Mont-Royal E, Montreal, QC H2J 1Y2
Review:
weve ordered twice for pickup here and both times our orders were delayed or wrong today we ordered a ultimate breakfast skillet but an ultimate breakfast bagel was packed mistakes are fine but i went back in to let the staff know behind the counter but they insisted it was right

i had to resort to loading the website and showing pictures it took about 5 mins of explaining what we ordered vs what they delivered to have our order rectified finally i left with the right order to find out it had been served with rice and sweet potato which isnt what a breakfast skillet is supposed to have see attached photo

i didnt bother to go back in at this point

we love the food here its healthful delicious and sustainable but this has been a really bad experience and they made no concessions as a way of apology

Address: 1215 Avenue Du Mont-Royal E, Montreal, QC H2J 1Y2
Review: the food gave me the ability to levitate and turn invisible delicious

Address: 1215 Avenue Du Mont-Royal E, Montreal, QC H2J 1Y2
Review: beets burger is their specialty i am very happy to learn that fast food is becoming healthier

Address: 7295 Des Galeries D'Anjou, QC H1M 2W2
Review:
french fries today were lacking the freshness promised lots  of chopped bits
hopefully next visit will taste freshly made
the oil needs changing tasted old and overcooked

Address: 7295 Des Galeries D'Anjou, QC H1M 2W2
Review: an ok place  but since its very close by the galleries anjou  if youre eating there on the weekend prepare to wait  sometimes the service is slow  i recommend that the staff has some grasp of asl because there was confusion with a deaf customer  other than that its a good place to grab something to eat  i would go only during the week and not the weekend

Address: 7295 Des Galeries D'Anjou, QC H1M 2W2
Review: delicious food i would not recommend their taco salad it wasnt good at all however their burgers are really good i found a piece of wire in my burger thankfully they made a new one without any issue excellent customer service and the new one was extremely good with crispy bacons

Address: 7295 Des Galeries D'Anjou, QC H1M 2W2
Review: its was a great its wasnt to load nice and clean staff was great food was great too great teamwork i seen while i waited to order and as i was waiting and i watched during my meal and it continued the flow was amazing thumbs up great job ladies and gents

Address: 7295 Des Galeries D'Anjou, QC H1M 2W2
Review: i was waiting more 10 min nobody came even to ask if wanted to order  9h30 am  then one guy saw me laught and stayed in back not to serve us me and the other client there  3 employees talking laughting not caring if people wanted to order  ill never go back

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève (Petite Italie)
Address: 91 Rue Beaubien Est, Montréal, QC H2S 1R1
Review: very yummy the have gigantic chocolatines the mini one is regular size i really like the vibe staff is nice the only thing i would say is they use some margarine and not all real butter so thats the minus one star would definitely come back

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève (Petite Italie)
Address: 91 Rue Beaubien Est, Montréal, QC H2S 1R1
Review: wonderful croissants good italianstyle espresso nice little seating area to sit and enjoy your pastries

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève (Petite Italie)
Address: 91 Rue Beaubien Est, Montréal, QC H2S 1R1
Review: friendly staff great products good quality try the frozen vol au ventspuff pastries to prepare at home loved their east location but happy they are now closer to where i live in petite italie

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève (Petite Italie)
Address: 91 Rue Beaubien Est, Montréal, QC H2S 1R1
Review: i have have only tried the croissant and its one of the best ive ever had in montreal the croissants had the perfect sweet buttery taste and were delightfully flakey saved in my favourites

Restaurant_Name: Boulangerie de Froment et de Sève (Petite Italie)
Address: 91 Rue Beaubien Est, Montréal, QC H2S 1R1
Review: typically adore their croissants and baguettes but recently got a chocolatine and baguette that were both well over baked the baguette seemed stale and was inedible the next day hoping it was just a fluke

Address: 5800 Boul Cavendish, Côte Saint-Luc, QC H4W
Review: i ordered on uber a plain slice pizza and poutine i received a veggie slice and burnt dry poutine called them up to let them know the guy banged down the phone on me and refused to do anything about it

Address: 5800 Boul Cavendish, Côte Saint-Luc, QC H4W
Review: a few days ago i was there on sunday  i ordered a large pizza with cheese and mushrooms  i paid about  20  two people finished a large pizza  thin and tasty  clean  fast  good price  the employees are polite  he seemed a little bit a beginner but he wasnt bad  i love this mall  so hos  anyways  i suggest you go eat pizza

Address: 5800 Boul Cavendish, Côte Saint-Luc, QC H4W
Review: i really dislike  orders take too much time  ive recieved a burned poutine and i will never go back to there again

Address: 5800 Boul Cavendish, Côte Saint-Luc, QC H4W
Review: price is okay i guess its according to the area and malls prices so higher than usual but okay however the taste is bad literally cardboard all you can taste is the canned olives its difficult to bitedigest the sauce and cheese are nonexistent the service is good theyre good people just the pizza is honestly bad

Address: 5800 Boul Cavendish, Côte Saint-Luc, QC H4W
Review:
just called to make an order based on the menu posted on the very nice looking website the young man on the other end of the line told me we do not do that anymore i think prices have gone up when asked simply said he did not know what the prices were except that they had generally gone up i asked him whether the owner knew what the prices for pizza were he said he did not know scratching my head here for realis this a prank

note  this was edited to reflect the food while the counter seems to be run by teenagers who are still learning how to do customer service the pizza is actually really tasty and fresh the prices were also reasonable  good if you have a family to feed

Address: 4299 Rue Ontario Est, Montréal, QC H1V 1K4
Review: my favourite coffe spot in hochelaga  thanks for all the coffee you made for me it cheered up my mornings sandwich mme canard is delicious

Address: 4299 Rue Ontario Est, Montréal, QC H1V 1K4
Review: we ordered double espresso and muffins and it was tasty good vibes great place for quality time

Address: 4299 Rue Ontario Est, Montréal, QC H1V 1K4
Review:
what a great find cozy coffee shop with tons of homemade pastries and sweets

the coffee was on point with the brew intensity flavour of the beans milk texture and temperature the croissants and chocolatine are flaky the brownies and cookies are decadent what else the atmosphere is welcoming spacious sitting areas and the staff are nice and effective

still have to try their food but im sure itll be a hit based on what i had so far

Address: 4299 Rue Ontario Est, Montréal, QC H1V 1K4
Review: that breakfast sandwich is huge and it also has duck  very tasty and also very happy to learn that it has lots of pickles that cold brew i got was huge and it was so cheap thankfully they let me get a togo cup it looked like people ordered it for here and than sat there with their laptops all morning which honestly looked like a really good deal

Address: 4299 Rue Ontario Est, Montréal, QC H1V 1K4
Review:
very nice little coffee and the food is all homemade i tried the caramelized onions ham grilled cheese  ohhhh my my
and the coffee  is perfect 
will come back and recommend this place

Address: 367 Rue De Castelnau Est, Montréal, QC H2R 1R1
Review: the croissant was amazing i havent had one since i went gluten free and it was so good bagels decent the person also gave me a taste of a chocolate coffee cake and it was very good

Address: 367 Rue De Castelnau Est, Montréal, QC H2R 1R1
Review: never in my life as a celiac have i come across a flakier croissant this bakery is such a treasure i make sure to visit every time i am in montréal

Address: 367 Rue De Castelnau Est, Montréal, QC H2R 1R1
Review: gluten free heaven as someone with celiac this bakery was top of my list sadly we went very late in the day so i do recommend ordering in advance or going early as the deliciousness sells out the palmiers were light and flakey and the madeleines were delicious with tea i was most impressed with the precooked chocolatines that i took away frozen and baked at home to my utter delight they were flaky goodness and not that sad dusty taste many gluten free products have im currently looking at shipping options to my city it was that good

Address: 367 Rue De Castelnau Est, Montréal, QC H2R 1R1
Review: 2 years now with a really hard diet after being diagnosed with celiac disease so my diet is really complicated glutenfree and dairyfree im so sensitive to it i still learning about this i went in boulangerie le marquis yesterday and i was almost crying after try some croissant that i bought to takeout but ended eating them before i went home because they are simply delicious i honestly want to say thank you you guys are the best

Address: 367 Rue De Castelnau Est, Montréal, QC H2R 1R1
Review: a wonderfully baked batch of pastries overall the lack of gluten is unnoticeable and there is no attempt to mask any taste with excessive sugar very moist and fluffy  a good option for anyone trying to avoid gluten

Address: 23 Rue Bernard Ouest, Montréal, QC H2T 2J6
Review: my partner and i randomly came here for brunch and we will be back extremely delicious value was incredible food was fresh local picks and everything was served quick service was amazing come and eat here

Address: 23 Rue Bernard Ouest, Montréal, QC H2T 2J6
Review:
a modern quebec influenced restaurant that serve local products a great place to try game meat for brunch or dinner  dressed and cooked nicely 
we got the caribou plate which is like a tasting menu on a plate delicious 
we also tried the croque forestier stuffed with earthy mushroom and covered with delicious cheese
for a sweet finish the french toast were soft and delightful

Address: 23 Rue Bernard Ouest, Montréal, QC H2T 2J6
Review:
food was excellent and unreal quality and quantity for the price  the waiters and waitresses were friendly and smiling only con is the restaurant is very loud so it can be hard to hear each other
overall great experience

Address: 23 Rue Bernard Ouest, Montréal, QC H2T 2J6
Review: we really enjoyed their chicken waffles and croissant benedict friendly servers busy place make a reservation if possible

Address: 23 Rue Bernard Ouest, Montréal, QC H2T 2J6
Review: service was amazing upon arriving we had two strollers and they immediately arranged the tables for a way to set our strollers aside  all staff were super accommodating  nicolann was our main server and was super patient and answered all our questions about the menu she was the best the food was top notch made from high quality ingredients  theres only so much i can say but you have to go to get the full experience

Address: 325 Thorold Rd W, Welland, ON L3C 3W4
Review: do not let the exterior fool you the food here is some of the best chinese we have had the portion size is fantastic fort he price im a fussy egg roll guy and these are some of the best i have had also the rice and beef chop suey are exceptional   the chicken balls are really good and not to over battered the service is good and the food is fast ot your table highly recommend eating in or thetakeout

Address: 325 Thorold Rd W, Welland, ON L3C 3W4
Review: ordered chicken balls house special fried rice general tso chicken and beef shanghai noodles everything was delicious and full of flavour the chicken balls had the perfect chickentobreading ratio wernt overly hard or soft just right the rice had a great amount of chicken pork and large whole shrimp enough to have some in every bite the general tso chicken and beef shanghai noodles had the perfect amount of spice in all my years living in welland i have never tried this place and glad i finally did

Address: 325 Thorold Rd W, Welland, ON L3C 3W4
Review: very nice dining room with friendly staff  a restaurant where you can actually sit down and have a nice meal with your family is great to see  the food is very fresh and full of flavour try lung fong out

Address: 325 Thorold Rd W, Welland, ON L3C 3W4
Review: ordered dinner for four for pick up  excellent quality and quantity  great won ton soup beef with veggies chicken balls etc  it is our go to place now

Address: 325 Thorold Rd W, Welland, ON L3C 3W4
Review: yummy looks a bit run down outside but it is decent inside and food was quite tasty  general tsos chicken yum  price was great and got alot of food for the price  young boy was very attentive and polite  will order again  my new chinese go to  try them food was fresh and flavourful  thank you

Address: 806 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1M3
Review: the service at aw is superb especially the customer service today supervisor shilpa made sure our orders were cooked and served freshly accurately and just on time aw is always our goto restaurant

Address: 806 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1M3
Review: i wish i could have given this 5 stars food was excellent although there were mistakes to my order that were fixed promptly they seemed to be rushing which caused the mistakes they do focus more on the drive thru than counter customers my order took 12 minutes at counter from time of order bar brew was excellent frozen root beer and sweet cream iced coffee was great

Address: 806 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1M3
Review: unfortunately while the server was very friendly  out order was completely wrong  coffee was not right for either of us and almost tasted burnt  no amount of sugar and cream added would lighten the coffee or take out the bitter taste  my bacon egger had egg shell and lettuce cooked in it  my husband ordered sausage and got bacon   we love aw but this location needs to step up their game  fort erie makes it perfect every time

Address: 806 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1M3
Review: very good food friendly customer service and didnt wait long either for food 55 would definitely come back

Address: 806 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1M3
Review:
before i begin this review i need to make it known that the staff did ask if my family could write a review that being said this does not change or influence the following statement

on april 1st my family was in the middle of moving and we stopped in to grab a quick bite what we experienced was service expected from a sit down restaurant not a fast food restaurant the staff were extremely friendly and welcoming they came to check on us on a regular basis to make sure everything was ok

i do not expect this from any fast food service but the fact that they went out of their way to go above and beyond says it all and i am beyond impressed with their service 10 out of 10 i have no complaints i look forward to returning to this location

they did ask for a review but they earned this with their incredible service a prime example of top tier customer service

Address: 631 Niagara St N, Welland, ON L3C 1L9
Review: this location is pretty awesome  nice clean facility  super clean washroom  play area for children  patio available  plenty of parking  fast service and friendly staff  free wifi

Address: 631 Niagara St N, Welland, ON L3C 1L9
Review:
the granddaughter and i went for a quick bite during errands and we ended up throwing away half our meal
the fries were way way to salty these extremely salty fries were in the kids happy meal tried to swap her fries for mine but mine were just as salty this is not the first time that this has happened guess i will have to head to the other mcdonalds in welland

the service that i received from staff was pleasant it was easy to note that the girl behind cash was not aware of some specials or gift coupon processes she worked through it all with a large smile

Address: 631 Niagara St N, Welland, ON L3C 1L9
Review:
first time worst behavior of staff stacey yelled at me at window i ordered 2 ice cream cones she said its only one i nicely said i placed order for 2 and can pay for other now she started making faces and yelled at me giving attitude turned her back on me when i called her again she started yelling loudly  its not my problem i dont need to learn from others how to behave
worst customer service ever i hope someone teach her how to speak and behave she is brutal

Address: 631 Niagara St N, Welland, ON L3C 1L9
Review:
i bring my kids every wednesday if you go go early ive started to go closer to 4305 no clean tables in sight i politely asked if they had a princess peach my daughters been anxiously awaiting it for weeks and finally saw it on someones try some girl in the background rudely said to the counter worker tell them thats all we have
im probably not coming back

Address: 631 Niagara St N, Welland, ON L3C 1L9
Review:
ordered today at 909 to realize my entire order was made wrong even the drinks were wrong i called once home and they told me to bring the food back and the receipt i waited in close to a 10 car drive thru the second time only to be told at the window to come inside so its fair for the rest of the line so they dont have to wait even though ive had to wait for my order for an hour to be made properly very contradicting
reilly rang through my order properly and then proceeded to charge me for bacon strips absolutely no consideration that i have children waiting for their breakfast for nearly an hour  gas money wasted due to their mistake they also took the food back with a bite taken out of a sandwich and made me open the sandwiches at the counter next time if you want to make it convenient please listen when someone is ordering or give proper direction of how to proceed on the phone when you call or at least at the intercom if i wanted to wait an hour for breakfast i would have made a gourmet one in that time at home

Address: 724 Niagara Street, Welland, ON L3C
Review: i v trier à new combo  whooper melt not badcold strawberry watermelon juice good in this weather

Address: 724 Niagara Street, Welland, ON L3C
Review: food is always bad quality  went there for whopper wednesday figuring why not give it another chance they end up charging me regular price whopper combo for 1050 i asked them for fresh fries and they tell me to park i realize i was charged too much so i walk in to get my order and to question the receipt they stand there saying well we would have to refund you and re ring you in for the whopper wednesday deal which they didnt want to spend the 2 minutes doing so so they offered me a free pie im like okay but make sure the fries are fresh please i literally watch and no new baskets of fries come up and they are acting as if they are waiting on fresh fries but then they scoop the old fries that have been sitting in the heater for probably 45 minutes or so they think everyone is stupid but burger king is declining especially this location the new st catherines location ok welland ave is amazing ask for fresh fries and they oblige they also give you the whopper wednesday deal without question

Address: 724 Niagara Street, Welland, ON L3C
Review: great location and the renovation is top notch super friendly staff and clean  will come back

Address: 724 Niagara Street, Welland, ON L3C
Review: i usually have good experiences with this place but tonight was the final straw i ordered my meal at least 10 mins go by no problem usually the wait for fast food but then the skip the dishes guy arrives pretty much the staff stop what they were doing and did the skip order first before the line of customers inside there was one kid that got there before me they put down his food then they immediately put it back please focus on the people that were there before the skip driver

Address: 724 Niagara Street, Welland, ON L3C
Review: 1130pm july19 2023 there was 8 kitchen employees working last night none of them could understand me speaking in english all of them were standing together holding hands and they failed to get my fountain drink order correctly these employees here do not like to work this is very common here

Address: 554 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1L8
Review: my visit on sunday nov 17th 2019 was 9 out of 10 clean place and friendly staff service was quick and efficient  menu was large and visible easy to understand the aroma of the baked breads was enticing with all the fixings in open view sandwich baristas wore gloves thank you  my sub and my families was perfect

Address: 554 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1L8
Review: awesome subs they dont implode

Address: 554 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1L8
Review: only had multi grain but actually liked it and it was soft here everytime i get stuck with that bread anywhere else its like chewing leather but was good here

Address: 554 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1L8
Review: nothing better than a subway sub with whatever pop your heart can mix

Address: 554 Niagara St, Welland, ON L3C 1L8
Review: ive been to this location a few times and theyve always been relatively positive i just ordered through the app for the first time and i received a burnt sandwich with no meat or cheese i ordered a steak  cheese but instead i seemed to have received a veggie sub unfortunately they were closed by the time i got home and ate otherwise i wouldve gone back and asked what the hell was that what a waste of money i want a refund

Address: 2 Tremont Dr, St Catharines, ON L2T 3B2
Review: this tims skimpy on meat orders a sandwich from there that had two pieces of turkey on it went to hartzel road tims they still give out 5 pieces of turkey on the sandwich dont waste your money at tremont tims top photo tremont bottom photo hartzel the person who owns tremont tims is either a cheap clown or is unaware this is happening although the lady at the counter told me it was policy at this store so im assuming cheap clown

Address: 2 Tremont Dr, St Catharines, ON L2T 3B2
Review:
bought the  new loaded cilantro lime chicken bowl
staff skimps on the portions
picture on menu shoes a full bowl brimming to the top the actual serving in the bowl is below the lip of the bowl basically misleading advertisements meant to seduce you into buying the product and shortchanged you on product 
food tasted good but was shortchanged on quantity

Address: 2 Tremont Dr, St Catharines, ON L2T 3B2
Review: one of the better tims locations in st catharines service was fast alongside a nice overall atmosphere

Address: 2 Tremont Dr, St Catharines, ON L2T 3B2
Review: would do 0 stars if i could seems like all the good staff is gone the staff there is horrible doesnt listen to orders have to repeat myself 5 to 8 times for them to type it in correctly  my drink is not complicated either legit steeped tea with skim milk  horrible customer service when i call last straw was an order was placed all 3 items given were wrong  i called and told them they said my name would be on the wall went over to get the correct item replacements and i was told i was not on the wall was told i could use the drive thru for the replacement order the girls at the windowbox demanded i go inside rude horrible snotty my entire family multiple daily visits each are not returning here

Address: 2 Tremont Dr, St Catharines, ON L2T 3B2
Review: ordered the last chocolate toasted coconut donut on the shelf today and paid for it  while waiting for my order i saw an employee took the last donut and went inside  i was told there wasnt any toasted coconut left  ended up getting a croissant instead  what happened to my donut

Address: 13210 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review: i go to this subway location on a regular basis the staff are super friendly and they quite often remember my previous order from the last time i was in all the fixing are fresh and the subs are made fast one of the best subways ive ever been to a

Address: 13210 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review: honestly the girls in here are amazing they are very kind and know my order when they see me highly recommended this subway the subs are always good fresh bread my favorite subway

Address: 13210 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review: clean location great service friendly staff raman is awesome always remembers my order and nails it everytime best subway location in niagara

Address: 13210 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review: whenever i visit this location i know what ill get  nice staff that serves fresh veggies and cookies with a smile on their face love the texmex bread and pecan caramel cookies hope they stay on the menu for a long time

Address: 13210 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review: go here everyday service is great know my sub before i even walk in very polite all around great much love

Address: 130 Highway 20 East, Fonthill, ON L0S
Review:
the best service
we started coming here a few months ago as we were new to the area and the staff here is so friendly and welcoming
the food is fast and hot you wont regret coming here
even when it was busy on mothers day we got a table right away

Address: 130 Highway 20 East, Fonthill, ON L0S
Review: i had a great experience at this location it took a little long to receive our bill but it could have been getting busier at that time it was nice and clean but at the time i went the sun was a little intense the bacon was huge and everything was cooked very well i would go again

Address: 130 Highway 20 East, Fonthill, ON L0S
Review: my boyfriend and i frequent this sunset grill and 90 of the time we have lynn as our server she is great every single time always so friendly and helpful excellent customer service on top of that the food is consistently delicious and fresh 1010 recommend

Address: 130 Highway 20 East, Fonthill, ON L0S
Review: food was excellent we had patty the server and she was fantastic so friendly and if you want to see them make your food its an open kitchen so its nice to see the people making your food

Address: 130 Highway 20 East, Fonthill, ON L0S
Review: toast was buttered cold so it was just a layer of cold butter on hard bread home fries looked like they would be cruchy but were so soggy and cold couldnt eat them and the place is more expensive than others in the area definitely wont return

Address: 844 Niagara Street, Unit F , Welland, ON L3C
Review: ever since the first time i went here it has been amazing every time i get a mix of takeout and dine in service is always great the staff there work really hard and are always showing a smile even when you can see they are swamped online ordering you can only get glutenfree free plain of their breakfast food but if you dinein you can ask for anything ive found except for the crepes to be glutenfree and you just pay an upcharge its amazing i usually get the french toast with strawberry ny cream cheese topping

Address: 844 Niagara Street, Unit F , Welland, ON L3C
Review:
wow some big portions huh
the food and service were great i had a healthy choice and i enjoyed it a lot 
i would recommend it any day you dont feel like cooking

Address: 844 Niagara Street, Unit F , Welland, ON L3C
Review: great food  service busy place so you might have to wait a bit for a table but turnover is pretty fast so you wont wait long my only complaint is that i ordered chocolate chip pancakes and was expecting chocolate chips inside the pancakes but they were just dropped on top with a few on the bottom otherwise great experience

Address: 844 Niagara Street, Unit F , Welland, ON L3C
Review: stacked on niagara st in welland is our fav today larissa served us she is such a sweetheart everything came perfectly as ordered and was delicious  as usual thank you to all their staff at this location this is the best stacked location by far see you next time

Address: 844 Niagara Street, Unit F , Welland, ON L3C
Review: this place is fantastic i had the benedict hash and they glady substituted the peameal bacon for sausage cause i dont like canadian bacon  the hollandaise sause was one of the best i had the portion was super large and i definitely could not eat it all this breakfast was also decently priced my only complaint is that it is so popular you may have to wait a bit for your food but the staff fill your coffee

Address: 7514 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2H 1G8
Review: food was amazing our waitress was alone and super attentive and helpful best pancakes ive had in a long time

Address: 7514 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2H 1G8
Review: we were there after travelling 60 km reached 8am in the morning but still closeddoor was opened we went inside and a lady asked how you get inside she surprised us the kitchen is still closedour kitchen girl coming latethis is how they are running the business we invited our friends there for breakfast very embracing moment for us

Address: 7514 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2H 1G8
Review:
as a family from the uk weve loved ihop when weve been to the us
the quality of the food and service is fabulous in the lundys lane restaurant
the only niggle is the price at least 50 more than i paid in tampa last year so lost a

Address: 7514 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2H 1G8
Review: canada food was different  everything tasted better than ihop in the us states

Address: 7514 Lundy'S Lane, Niagara Falls, ON L2H 1G8
Review: good discount for locals just ask them to remove the tourist tax if you are from the niagara region the portion of the omlette dishes can be too much sometimes for one person and can feed two people very well the strawberry milkshake was very tasty and filling overall the service was pretty fast compared to how busy they were around 12pm not my regular breakfast place but i like to visit this place once in a while

Address: 290 Glendale Ave, Unit #4, St. Catharines, ON L2T 2L3
Review: delicious food a little on the expensive side but definitely worth it our server was really accommodating and kind overall terrific place for breakfastbrunch

Address: 290 Glendale Ave, Unit #4, St. Catharines, ON L2T 2L3
Review:
honestly it a okay for me i personally just love the atmosphere and service but the food ive specifically gotten just didnt hit the spot the first time i came here i got the cinnabon and one of the drinks  pretty good the cinnabon on the other hand tasted like oil i was a bit confused on how they made it for it to taste like onions and oil the second time i went there i got the waffles and chicken with fries instead of
potatoes when i got the fries it came out orange brownish and i was confused and thought it was sweet potatoes but they said it wasnt it tasted bitter it just looked like they havent changed their oil but then i decided to change it back to the potatoes and it was also the same so that confirmed it for me the waffles was pretty good but the chicken was stiff and smalljust overall disappointed

Address: 290 Glendale Ave, Unit #4, St. Catharines, ON L2T 2L3
Review: the food was absolutely delicious and the service was great whenever i visit the niagara falls area i make sure to grab a meal here

Address: 290 Glendale Ave, Unit #4, St. Catharines, ON L2T 2L3
Review: great spot for breakfast service was amazing and omg the food was so fresh and delicious i ll definitely come back soon

Address: 290 Glendale Ave, Unit #4, St. Catharines, ON L2T 2L3
Review: shannon is an amazing server she was so kind and went above and beyond for us i always have an amazing experience here got to see uzoma and vanessa as a host today they have such positive energy and always smiling will definitely coming back soon

Address: 219 Highway 20, Fonthill, ON L0S 1E6
Review: ive been to this domenics a number of times usually for breakfast the staff is friendly and attentive  orders have always been correct and delicious food is brought to you as you ordered it my favorite dish is the waffle supremeits huge and served with whole pieces of berries other breakfast dishes are very good as well with decent proportions ill continue to go here thanks

Address: 219 Highway 20, Fonthill, ON L0S 1E6
Review: delicious and huge portion sizes the chipotle mayo was great had an awesome kick to it definitely recommend the southern fried chicken sandwich my boyfriend really enjoyed his chipotle burger as well will definitely be back

Address: 219 Highway 20, Fonthill, ON L0S 1E6
Review:
we had the honor of being the first wedding ever hosted here  50 guests
it was amazing food atmosphere and service were secondtonone all guests were very impressed
special thank you to mima for being amazing to work with from start to finish thank you so much for making our day extra special

if you are looking for a chic venue for smaller wedding speak to mima she will look after you
food service atmosphere was exactly what we expected thank you so much
whether a wedding or just a great spot to eat dominics on the 20 is a great spot

Address: 219 Highway 20, Fonthill, ON L0S 1E6
Review: stopped her for a bite to eat on my way home from dover it was great service was top notch and the portion size what very  large and enough left over for lunch the following day highly recommend stopping here if you are passing by and looking for food or even planing on going out to eat

Address: 219 Highway 20, Fonthill, ON L0S 1E6
Review: we were at the restaurant for a birthday party with a party of 26 the staff were wonderful the 2 tables we had were set up so nicely  even though we had a preset menu of 3 different entree choices they were accommodating if someone wanted something off the menu they could and did order  the food came out on time so we all ate together  the food was made to perfection and so tasty thank you to mimma and her staff for making our party a success

Address: 4025 Dorchester Rd #245, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review: overall its very good place was clean and staff were welcoming and pleasant  food was good and portions size is filling and good service was good and place has easy access to qew highway  as for price it was reasonable and size of waffle portion was large  i wish they take little bit care of overall presentation  washroom need more attention and regular maintenance as they said the cleanness of washroom is a good indicator of the place and food

Address: 4025 Dorchester Rd #245, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review:
we wanted a quick breakfast and a place to take a couple of work calls and send some emails we called ahead to check if they have wifi and free parking and they did

pleasantly surprised that it was such a big place serves breakfast all day

we ordered chicken quesadilla and a breakfast bagel sandwich and both were great

coffee for takeaway was also good

free brownie if you download their app

Address: 4025 Dorchester Rd #245, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review: heard it from frienddecided to go there and it was fab i ordered pirogies mocha and yogurt with berries everything was absolutely perfect will go there soon again

Address: 4025 Dorchester Rd #245, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review:
i really love the cheesy bacon and egg wrap but when i had it today it was awful the bacon was chewy and hard there was also a weird substance like sausage meat but not quite i usually dont have a problem here but i was disappointed today

i decided to give it another try the food has gone so downhill i had a simple cheese croissant with egg and bacon and it was doughy and soggy like how does that happen im very disappointed now i dont think i will order food here anymore

Address: 4025 Dorchester Rd #245, Niagara Falls, ON L2E
Review: i am happy that we decided to go there sitting area and delicious food gave us the feeling of perfect local place which we wanted to feel like we ordered small cappuccinos baked veggies sandwich but received veggie wrap cuz of some miscommunication i think and waffles with chocolate chip n marshmallows vanilla ice cream we really enjoyed everything moreover the girl who served us was so sweet n nice williams fresh café is on my  list now

Address: 420 Vansickle Rd, St. Catharines, ON L2S 0C7
Review:
paid for two six inch subs both were supposed to come with lettuce mayo and cheese one was also to have bacon as stated on menu  i received only tomato and onion on both  no one answered my several attempted phone calls nor when i returned to the store no one was at the counter  left with incorrect order out 17 dollars

would not recommend

Address: 420 Vansickle Rd, St. Catharines, ON L2S 0C7
Review: it was horrible after waiting forever we were finally given our food a bag that had been sitting out on the counter for at least 1015 min they just didnt call our number the food was cold already when we opened it the marinara pasta had a large chunk of meat in it i must say it was a horrible dining experiencei wasnt expecting much but i was left thinking how mcdonalds like some other walmarts  would have been way cheaper and better even as a vegetarian when i asked if there was a way to speak to a manager or leave a complaint i was told there was not and also told my food was not the bag that i was given that had been sitting on the counter for a while

Address: 420 Vansickle Rd, St. Catharines, ON L2S 0C7
Review: we just discovered this place in walmart its such a cool concept and the guy that served us was so helpful and friendly would totally come back again fun experience and then drink was delicious cookies and cream milkshake they made it fresh and even customized it my daughter was very happy

Address: 420 Vansickle Rd, St. Catharines, ON L2S 0C7

Review: i always love coras and they never disappoint had the most amazing service today too ashley was fantastic attentive and friendly and made the meal even better

Address: 210 Glendale Avenue B3, Saint Catharine'S, ON L2T 3Y6
Review:
food was good a little more dollar wise but worth the price

the hollandaise sauce on the eggs benidict was very thick and rich one of the best eggs benidict ive had

the chocolate chip pancakes were good but a bit pricey

overall a good go to place for breakfast

Address: 210 Glendale Avenue B3, Saint Catharine'S, ON L2T 3Y6
Review: extremely slow servicethere was 8 tables in total and 5 servers workingwaited 15 minutes to be seated when there were multiple tables openarrived at 1115 and finally at 1145 i ordered my foodservers are extremely forgetfuldidnt find the breakfast that goodomelette was extremely bland very a little sprinkle of cheesedefinitely not worth the price or wait time

Address: 210 Glendale Avenue B3, Saint Catharine'S, ON L2T 3Y6
Review: ive dropped in for breakfast a few times while in town for my sons university exams and this location is excellent with above and beyond experience from the greeting to seating food prep timing and delivery wait staff checking in and ensuring perfection i dont recommend anything very often publicly but this location consistently out performs expectations and its so nice to see pride in work and efforts special thanks to heather the server and her excellent team

Address: 210 Glendale Avenue B3, Saint Catharine'S, ON L2T 3Y6
